name: Monster Ruins
description:
This is a mechanical alpha for a game inspired by Slime Rancher, The Outer Wilds, and the Chao Garden from Sonic Adventure 2.

Using the various powers unlocked with new creatures, you would explore a large interconnected world, collect items, raise new pets and engage in minigames.

This early alpha prototype explores the gameplay loop of exploration, with traversal mechanics, including three of the core creature powers, Bounce, Strength, and Glide.

Additionally, there are a number of prototype scenes showing off the initial development of each feature, with a simple interactive commentary tool to explain the design and controls.

Controls

  • Movement - Left Stick / WASD
  • Camera - Right Stick / Mouse
  • Jump - A / Space Bar
  • Interact - X / E Key / Left Click
  • Pause Menu - Start / Escape Key
  • Inventory - Y / F Key
  • Glide - Left Trigger / Left Shift
  • Bounce Command - Right Trigger / Left Control / Q Key
